prj.title: CV Website for Job Application
desc: Developed a custom CV website for the restaurant industry using React.js and CSS, enhancing user interaction and style.
Implemented and refined React state management, laying groundwork for future functionality improvements.

prj.title: Google Developer Students Club Application
desc: Developed a skeleton copy of 'Off-White' website using Next.js and TailwindCSS.
Integrated web responsiveness using CSS media queries.

prj.title: Personal Portfolio Website
desc: Developed my first personal website using React.js and TailwindCSS, achieving a dynamic interface and modern design.
Discontinued the initial website prototype due to project structure issues, resulting in unresponsiveness and other flaws.
